location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to Richard Thomas Goodwin, Secretary and Translator in the Office of Country Correspondence, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, acknowledges the receipt of Richard Thomas Goodwin's letter of 7 February, which included a letter from the Governor, of Bombay, Mountstuart Elphinstone, to His Royal Highness Hussain Ali Merza [Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mīrzā], Prince Regent of Fars. Dow states that the letter was forwarded with the least delay possible.
